Frontal pole.EditorialNote: Don't know whether this term holds in all mammals.  I would suspect so, but need to confirm.  Update:  As this term is defined in the Allen mouse brain ontology, I am comfortable stating that it is present in mammals.  But the definition will be different.
Frontal pole.Definition: Component of the frontal lobe.  The rostral and caudal boundaries of the frontal pole are the superior frontal gyrus and the rostral division of the middle frontal gyrus respectively in human (Christine Fennama-Notestine).
